results.idea: Value × Momentum: rank low PB and high volume-adjusted momentum
results.description: Used two complementary fields (value and momentum). S1 applied: combined mdl77_deepvaluefactor_pb and mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_visiratio. S2 not applied (no vector fields identified). S3 not needed (both coverages >0.6). S4 applied: both fields have high userCount (70+ and 83) so signal is robust. Confidence set to 0.78 based on strong cross-sectional support for value+momentum.

results.idea: Free Cash Flow Yield adjusted by Enterprise EV/EBITDA (quality-value combo)
results.description: S1: combine free-cash-flow-to-price and EBITDA-to-EV to capture cash yield vs. valuation. S2 none. S3 not required (coverage high). S4 used fields with moderate-high userCounts. Confidence 0.72 reflecting consistent FCF signals.

results.idea: Earnings Surprise Momentum: recent surprise scaled by analyst dispersion
results.description: S1 combined a surprise metric and dispersion proxy. S2 none. S3 not needed. S4 used mdl77_surpriseanalystmodel_qsa_surpsn (high userCount) and mdl77_earningmomentumfactor_stdevfy2epsp. Confidence 0.70; earnings surprise strategies historically strong but event-timed.

results.idea: Momentum Reversion: short 3-month active leaders, long 6-12 month lagged winners
results.description: S1 used two momentum horizons (mdl177_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn3m_alt and mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_tstalp). S2 none. S3 not needed (coverage 1.0 and 0.9878). S4 used popular momentum fields. Confidence 0.66 - medium due to horizon conflict risk.

results.idea: Low Short Interest & Rising Cashflow: long low SIP and high delta FCF
results.description: S1 combined short-interest position (mdl77_2liquidityriskfactor_sip) and change in FCF (mdl77_historicalgrowthfactor_pfcfghc). S2 none. S3 coverage for sip is high (>0.98), for FCF change >0.93 so no backfill. S4 both have many users. Confidence 0.74 for liquidity+fundamentals signal.

results.idea: Quality Momentum: long improving operating margin and earnings revisions

results.idea: Earnings Revision Magnitude scaled by Size (tilt to large positive revisions)
